data.enText: willing to talk and give information to other people
I don't find him very communicative.

data.chText: 语言交际能力的（尤指用外语）
data.enText: connected with the ability to communicate in a language, especially a foreign language

means: 语言交际能力的(尤指用外语)

example: was a communicative person and quickly told all she knew"- W.M.Thackera

value.def: Someone who is communicative talks to people, for example about their feelings, and tells people things.

example.ex: She has become a lot more tolerant and communicative.
example.tran: 她变得宽容多了，也爱说话了。

value.def: Communicative means relating to the ability to communicate.

example.ex: We have a very communicative approach to teaching languages.
example.tran: 我们在语言教学中非常强调交际教学法。

value.tran: 交际能力的;表达能力的

trans: 交际法(外语教学中强调语言交际作用)
